Welcome to the Documentation for AtModWeb¶

The very creatively named AtModWeb is a Atmospheric Model Web Application. It gives users a way to run data-derived (emperical) models of the top-most layer of the atmosphere (thermosphere and ionosphere).

The models currently included in AtModWeb:

  1. NRLMSISE00
  2. International Reference Ionosphere (IRI) 2011

AtModWeb allows you to do two main things with the output of these models:

  1. Make Graphs / Plots How To Make A Plot
  2. Download Data How To Download Model Results
